body_html: Apart from that I love them: I liked the bigger ones better. Well, they were a bit tooo big, but I find them a bit too small now. I wouldn't mind if they take the room they deserve. It is quite an important part of the dashboard view, so they don't need to be shy. And because you ask ;-) I don't like the word 'status' in front of them. If their meaning is not clear at first sight, it will be clear the next day ;-)

body: Apart from that I love them: I liked the bigger ones better. Well, they were a bit tooo big, but I find them a bit too small now. I wouldn't mind if they take the room they deserve. It is quite an important part of the dashboard view, so they don't need to be shy. And because you ask ;-) I don't like the word 'status' in front of them. If their meaning is not clear at first sight, it _will_ be clear the next day ;-)
